General.Name: Wildcat Petroleum Plc
General.Description: Wildcat Petroleum Plc invests in the upstream sector of the petroleum industry. It focuses on the exploration, appraisal, development, and production of oil and gas. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Belmont House,, London, United Kingdom, UB8 1HE
